Reviews.Title: Best Smartphone on the market
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting to upgrade from my iPhone 4s for a while now but wasn't certain which phone to get.  I did a lot of research into which phones best suited my needs (email, web browsing, messaging) and the Z30 seemed like the best fit.  From the first day I bought it I haven't been able to put it down.  It is by far the best phone I have ever used and I could never go back to using an iPhone again.  The hub is one of the best creations in an OS and organizes your email, notifications and messages in a central place.  It definitely makes me more efficient.  I highly recommend this phone to anybody that is tired of the android or iOS experience.  You will definitely be amazed.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Z-30 great phone
Reviews.Author: W.H.
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry Z-30 is a superb smartphone. It is just small enough to manage in one hand while being large enough to read and view the content. It is responsive and fast. It takes a while to gain skill at using only gestures, but after learning, it is hard to go back to other phones. The key apps are available including many Android apps even if there are not a million apps. Great battery life too.

Reviews.Title: It is The Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: E.Kosh
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for about a month. And never regretted paying $499.00 at BlackBerry store. Having three IPHONE and two Samsung phones in a family and being old Nokia only fan since 90s ... I can only say that Z30 is all you want in your Phone . Great reception, longest battery life, clear sound - loudspeakers or microphone.  insanely excellent word prediction, well thought menu, perfectly laid out icons, fantastic build quality.Had BlackBerry Pearl in the past and really..had itAfter my old trusty N9 gave up i explored ideas of IPhone, HTC one, Samsung.Was trying to see Z30 before buying. Sadly NONE of Chicago area Verizon stores had Z30 in stock, Leave alone T Mobile pushing Samsung, HTC And I phones.Love this phone, no doubts the best I ever had !!!
